story_24_51000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Oh, come on! You found ANOTHER
of our hideouts?
story_24_51000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Our backs are really up against the wall now!
We’ve got no choice but to fight back!
story_24_51000/2401_1001_0300_10:
You nitwits don’t really think you stand a chance
against me, do you?
story_24_51000/2401_1001_0400_10: Donphan, go! Wipe the floor with these—
story_24_51000/2401_1001_0500_10: Wait, young master! We came to back you up!
story_24_51000/2401_1001_0600_10: Yeah, like, let us give you a ha—
story_24_51000/2401_1001_0700_10: Save it! You two would only get in the way!
story_24_51000/2401_1001_1100_10: H-how is a lone Trainer beating us this handily?
story_24_51000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Hmph. That’s right! Come at me with whatever
Pokémon you like—you’ll lose just the same!
story_24_51000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Your strength is a sight to behold, young
master. But if you keep shouldering all these
burdens alone...
story_24_51000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Did you not hear me the first hundred times,
Sawyer? I’m—
story_24_51000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I’m going on ahead. You two stay here and deal
with him!
story_24_51000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Well, he certainly seemed eager to cut you
two loose.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_2200_10:
You again? Whyyy do you keep, like, barging in
wherever we go?
story_24_51000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Like I’ve said before, if Hoopa has fallen into Team
Break’s hands, that spells danger for all of Pasio.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_2400_10: Plus, I can’t help but worry about Lear.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Back home in Unova, I work as a Gym Leader and
a teacher.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Although Lear’s not my student, I can’t let him do
whatever he pleases, seeing how reckless he is.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Sorry, but your teacherly instincts are nooot our
style. We don’t need your help, like, at all.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_3000_10: Heeey. You, like, falling asleep over there?
story_24_51000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Listen, kid—I mean, Cheren. I took the liberty of
looking up a little more about you.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_3200_10:
I know you didn’t get to be a teacher without
some leadership skills.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_3300_10:
So what do you say to using those skills...to
help our young master find his way?
story_24_51000/2401_1001_3400_10: Whaaat?! What are you even saying?
story_24_51000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Ever since he lost to [Name:PlayerNickname ],
the young master’s been growing more and more
obsessed with becoming powerful.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_3600_10: He can’t afford to go on that way.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_3700_10:
I’m worried the young master’ll get himself into
big trouble if he takes the throne without learning
what it means to be a true king first.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_3800_10:
You see it too, don’t you, Rachel?
That temperament of his isn’t kingly at all.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_4000_10:
Let’s enlist Cheren’s help. It’s for the young
master’s sake, after all.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_4200_10:
If you’re really that sure, Sawyer, then I guess it’s
fine... Not that I’m, like, bursting with confidence
in this guy.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_4300_10:
Well, it may not relate directly to saving Hoopa,
but it sounds like your problems run deeper than
I thought.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_4400_10: Please, tell me all you can about Lear.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_4500_10:
I know that to you, the young master probably
looks like some power-obsessed snob who treats
people and Pokémon like tools.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_4600_10:
But he used to be a kind boy—the type of son
you’d hope to see in a royal family.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_4800_10:
Yeeeah, back in the day. He could count on us
for anything, and he was a real sweetheart to
Pokémon, too.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_4900_10:
But things were never really the same after Her
Majesty the queen passed away.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_5000_10: The queen being Lear’s mother, correct?
story_24_51000/2401_1001_5100_10:
Right. After she passed, His Majesty the king took
the young master from our care and sent him off
to a strict school.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_5200_10:
And when he came back, there wasn’t much left
of the kind boy we knew.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_5300_10:
We were, like, shocked. Our little Master Lear
suddenly couldn’t trust anyone but himself.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_5400_10:
He started saying awful things, like, like telling
people and Pokémon they were just dead weight
dragging him down.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_5500_10: Kiiinda like what he said back there.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_5600_10:
So not only did he lose his mother, he was also 
torn from the two people he relied on most.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_5700_10:
Between all that loss and the rough experiences he
must have had at school, it sounds like he lost his
trust in others.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_5800_10:
I’ve been hoping that running the PML would help
him work through some of his troubles.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_5900_10:
Think about the meaning of the five badges and
how the tournament’s structure allows Trainers to
team up with sync pairs they’ve battled against.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_6000_10:
The rules don’t really sound like something the
young master’d come up with, do they? That’s
cause I’m the one who made the arrangements.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_6100_10:
The idea was that the setup would help him
remember what it’s like to trust people
and Pokémon.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_6200_10:
But my efforts weren’t enough to make any
difference in the young master.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_6300_10: I’m sorry to hear that, Sawyer.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_6400_10: Please, Cheren—make the difference I couldn’t.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_6500_10:
Help him find his old self who cared so much
about those close to him...so he can become a
worthy king.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_6700_10:
I don’t have half as deep a history with Lear
as you two, and as far as teaching goes, I’m
still a beginner.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_6800_10:
But in some ways, that might actually make me
just the person for the job.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_6900_10:
I’ll do what I can to help Lear become a loving
and beloved king.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_7000_10: All right! Thank you. It means a lot to me.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_7100_10: You haven’t won my trust juuust yet, you know.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_7200_10:
But if you’re gonna do it, like, give it all you got.
This is Master Lear we’re talking about.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_7300_10: Of course I will. He’ll get my full effort.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_7400_10: But there’s one thing I still don’t understand.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_7500_10:
How does Hoopa figure into this? It never came
up during your story.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_7600_10:
Well, to tell the truth, we don’t get the deal with
Hoopa ourselves.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_7700_10:
The young master just showed up with it all of a
sudden after we decided to put together the PML.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_7800_10:
He wouldn’t tell us where or how he met it, let
alone why it’s helping him.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_7900_10:
Odd. Well, if you don’t know, you don’t know,
I suppose. No point dwelling on it for now.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_8000_10:
In any case, I’d like to get started with Lear
right away.
story_24_51000/2401_1001_8100_10:
But to do that, I need to ask the two of you for
a favor...
